name: H & M Hennes & Mauritz AB
membership: EBCA, Svensk Handel, Svenskt Näringsliv, Global Fashion Agenda, Sustainable Apparel Coalition, Policy Hub, UNFCCC Fashion charter, ACT, Ellen MacArthur Foundation,
goal:
The H&M group is making fashion and quality at the best price in a sustainable way to everyone.

H&M group's aim at EU level is to monitor EU developments on topics of interest for the company and engage with EU decision-makers about H&M group's work and positions.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: International Trade, FTAs - Internal market, Goods Package - digital market, GDPR - sustainability topics (climate, circular economy, due diligence, transparency) - AI
